Text.Page:
Look, I know you want to take Titus with you, but his work provides 68% of our income!

We can't just let him go."What can I do to help?"

(Calculating...) So, we can make it up in volume, but we need to secure our supply lines to do it.

If you don't agree to escort one of the Mysterium's self-driving wagons to the patrol camp at Casidhe's Stand, there's a 98.7% chance that orcans will steal the shipment. Go and help Gazarun safely deliver our materials.

I'll leave the ultimate decision about Titus with Gazarun."The Orcans won't touch a thing."
(The wagon is fully loaded and looks heavy. This might take a while.)

Aha!

You must be the special escort Duzorun hired!

Job well done!

I don't like it, but I hereby consent to a temporary leave of absence for Titus. But I'm trusting you to bring him back in one piece!"I will."
